availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William M. Holland (Green County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha A. Scott Holland in Washington County, Kentucky, in 1831. Father of Robert B. Holland, George W.S. Holland, John D. Holland, Sarah A. Holland, Benjamin F. Holland, E.I. Holland, H.M. Holland, and Mary E. Holland. Farmer in LaRue County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, LaRue County, Hamiltons District, p. 402A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 633.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Greensburg Precinct, p. 403B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Washington County Marriages, Film 000551244.
